long.ar:
Web Paint - Page Marker & Editor enables you to make annotations and modifications on websites. This extension allows you to draw, add text, insert lines, and highlight content directly on web pages and PDFs. The tool is compatible with both mouse and touchscreen inputs, giving you the ability to create and save your edits to your device.

Whether you're a student, a professional, or simply an avid web user, this extension is a valuable addition. It offers a range of advanced annotation tools, such as a pencil, highlighter, color picker, arrow, polygon, text, and emojis.

Are you accustomed to highlighting important text in books or do you want to draw directly on websites in real-time from your browser? Perhaps you need to share your screen for tasks like reporting technical issues, creating product demonstrations, or crafting how-to tutorials.

Here's why you should consider using our extension:
- It includes all the features found in MS Paint.
- You can adjust the thickness, transparency, and choose preset colors.
- Capture a screenshot of the entire page.

Paint Online is a lightweight and free Chrome extension designed for educational purposes, introducing anyone to the world of drawing right within their browser. Additionally, it offers the opportunity to practice the alphabet, numbers, and artwork while learning.

The extension allows for full-page screen captures, saving the screenshots as PDFs or images. These instant captures are stored locally and don't generate online traffic. The screenshot tool functions offline and is incredibly user-friendly. You can easily choose between full-screen or partial area captures with a single click. Furthermore, you have the flexibility to customize the screenshots by adding text, drawing lines, arrows, and shapes.

The extension provides the following features:
1.Convenient hotkeys for each tool
2. Save drawings along with screenshots
3. Save images to your PC or print them
4. Crop and save specific image areas

Paint on web and Screenshot Tool in simple manner and without any difficulties. Draw online with our new and absolutely free extension for chrome browser.

With Page Marker, you can use your mouse or touchscreen to draw on the web or on PDFs and save it to your computer. Paint, draw, and mark on any webpage or website. It is just a fun Web paint extension, and you can get some laughs using this extension by creating funny faces, etc., on web pages.

Also it best tool for working with PDF files - PDF Office is a PDF Editor online from which you can perform editing operations over PDF files but using your web browser. 

Known as a web paint or paint online tool extension is a useful have for students, teammates and everyone who works with websites content, as you could easily learn or save information, create custom tutorials or paper notes, if you’d decided to print it.

Please rate our Paint Tool extension if you like it. Happy painting everyone.

Web Paint  is one of the best fun painting and drawing app for you for Chrome! 

Draw beautiful drawings and unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Web Paint Tool  is absolutely lite weight and completely free extension  which can be used for educational purpose and introducing anyone to drawing right from your browser. It can be used to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings while educating.

This app has a simple and easy to use design. It is not confusing and easily recognis able icons are used in the app which makes it easy and quite simple to use. This is a single screen and one click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on app icon, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks required to actually start working on the app.

- This App offers you a white background for you to start fresh drawing on.

- Web Paint offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Paint Pro is a lightweight paint app which hardly takes any space on your device.
- Paint works on both phones and Tablets.

You can share your images on Pinterest board.

Web Paint - značka a editor stránek vám umožňuje provádět anotace a úpravy na webových stránkách. Toto rozšíření umožňuje kreslit, přidávat text, vkládat čáry a zvýrazňovat obsah přímo na webových stránkách a souborech PDF. Naše rozšíření nástroje pro malování má jednoduchý a snadno použitelný design. Není to matoucí a v aplikaci jsou použity snadno rozpoznatelné ikony nástrojů (tužka, kbelík s barvou, guma a další nástroj), což usnadňuje použití pro každého.

Værktøjet er kompatibelt med input fra både mus og berøringsskærm, hvilket giver dig mulighed for at oprette og gemme dine redigeringer på din enhed.

Uanset om du er studerende, professionel eller blot en ivrig webbruger, er denne udvidelse en værdifuld tilføjelse. Det tilbyder en række avancerede annoteringsværktøjer, såsom en blyant, highlighter, farvevælger, pil, polygon, tekst og emojis.

Er du vant til at fremhæve vigtig tekst i bøger, eller vil du tegne direkte på hjemmesider i realtid fra din browser? Måske skal du dele din skærm til opgaver som rapportering af tekniske problemer, oprettelse af produktdemonstrationer eller udarbejdelse af vejledninger.

Maleværktøj - tegn på enhver hjemmeside, tilføj tekst, tilføj linjer og fremhæv! Med Web Paint kan du bruge din mus eller berøringsskærm til at tegne på nettet eller på PDF'er og gemme det på din computer. Mal, tegn og markér på enhver webside eller hjemmeside.

1. Installer Web Paint-udvidelsen, og genindlæs siden for at lade udvidelsen virke.
2. Klik på udvidelsen, når du skal tegne eller fremhæve noget.
3. Tegninger gemmes automatisk.
4. Tag et skærmbillede.
5. Genindlæs siden for at afslutte tegnetilstanden fra browseren.

Web Paint - Page Marker & Editor enables you to make annotations and modifications on websites. This extension allows you to draw, add text, insert lines, and highlight content directly on web pages and PDFs. The tool is compatible with both mouse and touchscreen inputs, giving you the ability to create and save your edits to your device.

Whether you're a student, a professional, or simply an avid web user, this extension is a valuable addition. It offers a range of advanced annotation tools, such as a pencil, highlighter, color picker, arrow, polygon, text, and emojis.

Are you accustomed to highlighting important text in books or do you want to draw directly on websites in real-time from your browser? Perhaps you need to share your screen for tasks like reporting technical issues, creating product demonstrations, or crafting how-to tutorials.

Here's why you should consider using our extension:
- It includes all the features found in MS Paint.
- You can adjust the thickness, transparency, and choose preset colors.
- Capture a screenshot of the entire page.

Paint Online is a lightweight and free Chrome extension designed for educational purposes, introducing anyone to the world of drawing right within their browser. Additionally, it offers the opportunity to practice the alphabet, numbers, and artwork while learning.

The extension allows for full-page screen captures, saving the screenshots as PDFs or images. These instant captures are stored locally and don't generate online traffic. The screenshot tool functions offline and is incredibly user-friendly. You can easily choose between full-screen or partial area captures with a single click. Furthermore, you have the flexibility to customize the screenshots by adding text, drawing lines, arrows, and shapes.

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

What is a Screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Options to include or exclude the mouse cursor.
There is screen recording software available that captures all of the activity on a computer monitor and turns it into a video file.

Lo strumento è compatibile sia con gli input del mouse che del touchscreen, dandoti la possibilità di creare e salvare le tue modifiche sul tuo dispositivo.

Che tu sia uno studente, un professionista o semplicemente un appassionato utente del Web, questa estensione è un'aggiunta preziosa. Offre una gamma di strumenti di annotazione avanzati, come matita, evidenziatore, selettore di colori, freccia, poligono, testo ed emoji.

Sei abituato a mettere in evidenza testi importanti nei libri o vuoi disegnare direttamente sui siti web in tempo reale dal tuo browser? Forse hai bisogno di condividere il tuo schermo per attività come la segnalazione di problemi tecnici, la creazione di dimostrazioni di prodotti o la creazione di tutorial pratici.

Dipingi online o aggiungi informazioni su una pagina Web per evidenziare i momenti, quindi acquisisci uno screenshot di un'intera pagina Web o solo di un'area selezionata con un'opzione per scaricarla o condividerla. Schermata completamente personalizzata che può essere stampata, salvata o inviata istantaneamente.

Contiene gli strumenti di cui hai bisogno:
  - Strumento matita: disegna linee personalizzate
  - Strumento di testo: aggiungi annotazioni
  - Emoji: aggiungi belle emoji su qualsiasi pagina web

  - Strumento Linea: posiziona il punto iniziale e finale per disegnare una linea retta
  - Curva quadratica - disegna una curva quadratica con la larghezza della linea selezionata
  - Curva di Bezier - traccia una curva di Bezier con la larghezza della linea selezionata
  - Strumento Poligono: disegna un poligono con la larghezza della linea selezionata
  - Strumento Ellisse: disegna un'ellisse o un cerchio con lo spessore della linea selezionato
  - Strumento contagocce: scegli un colore dalla pagina web o dai tuoi disegni
  - Strumento screenshot: il creatore di screenshot consente di salvare i risultati in PN o JPG

Tutti gli strumenti come in MS Paint ma solo nel tuo browser. Dipingi sul web

ペイントツールの設定が簡単

Web Paint - Page Marker & Editor enables you to make annotations and modifications on websites. This extension allows you to draw, add text, insert lines, and highlight content directly on web pages and PDFs. The tool is compatible with both mouse and touchscreen inputs, giving you the ability to create and save your edits to your device.

Whether you're a student, a professional, or simply an avid web user, this extension is a valuable addition. It offers a range of advanced annotation tools, such as a pencil, highlighter, color picker, arrow, polygon, text, and emojis.

Are you accustomed to highlighting important text in books or do you want to draw directly on websites in real-time from your browser? Perhaps you need to share your screen for tasks like reporting technical issues, creating product demonstrations, or crafting how-to tutorials.

Here's why you should consider using our extension:
- It includes all the features found in MS Paint.
- You can adjust the thickness, transparency, and choose preset colors.
- Capture a screenshot of the entire page.

Paint Online is a lightweight and free Chrome extension designed for educational purposes, introducing anyone to the world of drawing right within their browser. Additionally, it offers the opportunity to practice the alphabet, numbers, and artwork while learning.

The extension allows for full-page screen captures, saving the screenshots as PDFs or images. These instant captures are stored locally and don't generate online traffic. The screenshot tool functions offline and is incredibly user-friendly. You can easily choose between full-screen or partial area captures with a single click. Furthermore, you have the flexibility to customize the screenshots by adding text, drawing lines, arrows, and shapes.

Paint Tool - draw on any website, add text, add lines, and highlight! With Web Paint, you can use your mouse or touchscreen to draw on the web or on PDF and save it to your computer. Paint, draw, and mark on any webpage or website.

Whether you're a student, a professional, or just someone who loves browsing the web is a must-have extension. You'll have access to an array of advanced annotation tools, including a pencil, highlighter, color picker, arrow, polygon, text, emoji, and more.

Easy to set up extension:
1. Install the Web Paint extension, and reload the page to let the extension work.
2. Click on the extension whenever you need to draw or highlight something. 
3. Drawings are automatically saved.
4. Take Screenshot.
5. Reload the page to exit the draw mode from the browser.

Here are reasons to choose our extension:
1. Has all the features of MS Paint.
2. Adjustable thickness, transparency, and preset color.
3. Take a screenshot of the page.

페인트 도구 - 웹사이트에 그림을 그리고, 텍스트를 추가하고, 선을 추가하고, 강조 표시하세요! 웹 페인트를 사용하면 마우스나 터치스크린을 사용하여 웹이나 PDF에 그림을 그리고 컴퓨터에 저장할 수 있습니다. 모든 웹 페이지 또는 웹 사이트에서 페인트하고, 그리고 표시하십시오.

손쉬운 페인트 도구 설정
1. 웹 페인트 확장 프로그램을 설치하고 확장 프로그램이 작동하도록 페이지를 다시 로드합니다.
2. 무언가를 그리거나 강조 표시해야 할 때마다 확장 프로그램을 클릭하십시오.
3. 도면이 자동으로 저장됩니다.
4. 스크린샷을 찍습니다.
5. 페이지를 다시 로드하여 브라우저에서 그리기 모드를 종료합니다.

책을 읽고 중요한 텍스트를 강조 표시하는 데 익숙하거나 브라우저에서 편안하게 실시간으로 웹사이트에 그림을 그리고 싶습니까? 이 간단한 확장 기능이 도움이 될 것입니다!

기술 문제 보고, 제품 데모 또는 사용 방법 튜토리얼과 같은 사례를 위해 화면을 공유하고 싶습니까? Chrome용 페인트 도구를 선택해야 하는 이유는 다음과 같습니다.

1. MS Paint의 모든 기능을 가지고 있습니다.
2. 조정 가능한 두께, 투명도 및 사전 설정 색상.
3. 페이지의 스크린샷을 찍습니다.

온라인 페인트는 가벼운 무게와 교육 목적으로 사용할 수 있는 Chrome용 무료 확장 프로그램으로 누구에게나 브라우저에서 바로 그림을 그릴 수 있도록 소개합니다. 또한 교육하면서 알파벳, 숫자, 그림을 연습할 수 있습니다.

전체 페이지 화면 캡처를 수행합니다. 이미지 스크린샷을 PDF 또는 이미지로 저장합니다. 인스턴트 스크린샷은 로컬에 저장되며 트래픽을 생성하지 않습니다. 스크린샷 도구는 오프라인에서 작동할 수 있습니다.

화면 캡처 생성은 그 어느 때보다 쉽습니다. 전체 화면 또는 부분 영역에서 선택하고 한 번의 클릭으로 가져옵니다. 그런 다음 텍스트 추가, 선 그리기, 화살표 및 도형과 같은 스크린샷을 완전히 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.

그림판 - 온라인 그리기 - 경쟁업체보다 나은 이유는 무엇입니까?
✓ 클립보드에 복사
✓ 이미지 인쇄
✓ 이메일
✓ 캡처를 외부 편집기로 내보내기
✓ 스크린샷에 페이지 정보 추가(URL, 제목, 시간, 도메인 등)

Pinterest 보드에서 이미지를 공유할 수 있습니다.
또한 필요한 기능도 포함되어 있습니다.
- 각 도구에 대한 단축키
- 스크린샷 옵션으로 도면 저장
- 이미지를 PC에 저장하거나 인쇄
- 이미지의 필요한 부분을 잘라서 저장

중요 공지
설치/업데이트 후 웹 그림판이 작동하려면 브라우저에서 활성 탭을 다시 로드하십시오.

우리를 평가! 최고의 Chrome 환경을 제공하기 위해 최선을 다하고 있습니다. 저희 확장 프로그램이 마음에 드신다면 별점 5점을 남겨주세요! 질문, 의견 또는 제안 사항이 있으면 기꺼이 듣겠습니다! 아래 연락처 정보를 참조하십시오.

Dažymo įrankis ir Ekrano kopija – puslapio žymeklis ir redaktorius leidžia daryti komentarus ir keisti svetainėse. Šis plėtinys leidžia piešti, pridėti teksto, įterpti eilutes ir paryškinti turinį tiesiai tinklalapiuose ir PDF rinkmenose. Įrankis suderinamas su pelės ir jutiklinio ekrano įvestimis, todėl galite kurti ir išsaugoti pakeitimus savo įrenginyje.

Nesvarbu, ar esate studentas, profesionalas ar tiesiog aistringas interneto naudotojas, šis plėtinys yra vertingas papildymas. Ji siūlo daugybę pažangių komentarų įrankių, tokių kaip pieštukas, žymeklis, spalvų parinkiklis, rodyklė, daugiakampis, tekstas ir jaustukai.

Ar esate įpratę paryškinti svarbų tekstą knygose, ar norite piešti tiesiogiai svetainėse realiuoju laiku iš savo naršyklės? Galbūt jums reikia bendrinti ekraną, kad galėtumėte atlikti tokias užduotis kaip pranešti apie technines problemas, kurti produktų demonstracijas arba rengti mokymo programas.

Dažymo įrankis – pieškite bet kurioje svetainėje, pridėkite teksto, pridėkite eilučių ir paryškinkite! Naudodami „Web Paint“ galite naudoti pelę arba jutiklinį ekraną, norėdami piešti žiniatinklyje arba PDF failuose ir išsaugoti juos savo kompiuteryje. Dažykite, pieškite ir pažymėkite bet kuriame tinklalapyje ar svetainėje.

Lengvai sukonfigūruojamas dažymo įrankis
1. Įdiekite „Web Paint“ plėtinį ir iš naujo įkelkite puslapį, kad plėtinys veiktų.
2. Spustelėkite plėtinį, kai reikia ką nors nupiešti ar paryškinti.
3. Brėžiniai išsaugomi automatiškai.
4. Padarykite ekrano kopiją.
5. Iš naujo įkelkite puslapį, kad išeitumėte iš piešimo režimo iš naršyklės.

Įpratote skaityti knygas ir paryškinti svarbius tekstus ar tiesiog norėjote piešti bet kurioje svetainėje realiuoju laiku patogiai naršyklėje? Šis paprastas plėtinys jums padės!

Norite bendrinti savo ekraną, pavyzdžiui, pranešti apie technines problemas, kurti produktų demonstracines versijas ar mokymo programas? Štai priežastys, kodėl verta rinktis „Chrome“ skirtą dažymo įrankį

1. Turi visas MS Paint funkcijas.
2. Reguliuojamas storis, skaidrumas ir iš anksto nustatyta spalva.
3. Padarykite puslapio ekrano kopiją.

„Paint online“ yra lengvas ir nemokamas „Chrome“ plėtinys, kurį galima naudoti švietimo tikslais ir supažindinti visus su piešimu tiesiai iš naršyklės. Be to, lavinant galima praktikuoti abėcėlę, skaičius ir paveikslus.

Užfiksuokite viso puslapio ekraną. Išsaugokite vaizdo ekrano kopiją PDF formatu arba vaizdus. Momentinės ekrano kopijos saugomos vietoje ir nesukuria srauto. Ekrano kopijos įrankis gali veikti neprisijungus.

Ekrano fiksavimo kūrimas yra lengvas, kaip ir galėjo būti. Pasirinkite iš viso ekrano arba dalinės srities ir spustelėkite ją. Tada galite visiškai tinkinti ekrano kopijas, pvz., pridėti tekstą, piešti linijas, rodykles ir figūras.

Kodėl Piešti – piešti internete – geriau nei konkurentai?
✓ Kopijuoti į mainų sritį
✓ Spausdinkite vaizdus
✓ El. paštas
✓ Eksportuokite fiksavimus į išorinį redaktorių
✓ Pridėkite puslapio informaciją prie ekrano kopijų (URL, pavadinimo, laiko, domeno ir kt.)

Galite pasidalinti savo vaizdais Pinterest lentoje.
Jame taip pat yra jums reikalingų funkcijų:
- Kiekvieno įrankio spartieji klavišai
- Išsaugokite piešinį naudodami ekrano kopijos parinktį
- Išsaugokite vaizdą savo kompiuteryje arba spausdinkite
- Apkarpykite reikiamą vaizdo sritį ir išsaugokite ją

Svarbus pastebėjimas
Įdiegę / atnaujinę iš naujo įkelkite aktyvius naršyklės skirtukus, kad „Web Paint“ veiktų.

Įvertinkite mus! Labai stengiamės suteikti jums geriausią „Chrome“ patirtį. Jei jums patinka mūsų plėtinys, pateikite 5 žvaigždučių įvertinimą! Jei turite klausimų, pastabų ar pasiūlymų, mielai juos išklausysime! Žemiau nurodykite mūsų kontaktinius duomenis.

Web paint — lapu marķieris un redaktors ļauj vietnēs veikt anotācijas un modifikācijas. Šis paplašinājums ļauj zīmēt, pievienot tekstu, ievietot līnijas un izcelt saturu tieši tīmekļa lapās un PDF failos. Rīks ir savietojams gan ar peles, gan skārienekrāna ievadi, sniedzot iespēju izveidot un saglabāt labojumus savā ierīcē.

Neatkarīgi no tā, vai esat students, profesionālis vai vienkārši dedzīgs tīmekļa lietotājs, šis paplašinājums ir vērtīgs papildinājums. Tas piedāvā virkni uzlabotu anotācijas rīku, piemēram, zīmuli, marķieri, krāsu atlasītāju, bultiņu, daudzstūri, tekstu un emocijzīmes.

Vai esat pieradis izcelt svarīgu tekstu grāmatās vai vēlaties zīmēt tieši vietnēs reāllaikā no pārlūkprogrammas? Iespējams, jums ir nepieciešams kopīgot ekrānu, lai veiktu tādus uzdevumus kā ziņošana par tehniskām problēmām, produktu demonstrāciju izveide vai pamācību izstrāde.

Krāsošanas rīks — zīmējiet jebkurā vietnē, pievienojiet tekstu, pievienojiet līnijas un izceliet! Izmantojot Web Paint, varat izmantot peli vai skārienekrānu, lai zīmētu tīmeklī vai PDF failos un saglabātu to savā datorā. Krāsojiet, zīmējiet un atzīmējiet jebkurā tīmekļa lapā vai vietnē.

Viegli uzstādāms krāsošanas rīks
1. Instalējiet paplašinājumu Web Paint un atkārtoti ielādējiet lapu, lai paplašinājums darbotos.
2. Noklikšķiniet uz paplašinājuma ikreiz, kad vēlaties kaut ko uzzīmēt vai izcelt.
3. Zīmējumi tiek automātiski saglabāti.

What is a Screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Options to include or exclude the mouse cursor.
There is screen recording software available that captures all of the activity on a computer monitor and turns it into a video file.

Narzędzie do malowania - znacznik i edytor stron umożliwia wprowadzanie adnotacji i modyfikacji na stronach internetowych. To rozszerzenie umożliwia rysowanie, dodawanie tekstu, wstawianie linii i wyróżnianie treści bezpośrednio na stronach internetowych i plikach PDF. Narzędzie jest kompatybilne zarówno z myszką, jak i ekranem dotykowym, co daje możliwość tworzenia i zapisywania zmian na urządzeniu.

Niezależnie od tego, czy jesteś studentem, profesjonalistą, czy po prostu zapalonym użytkownikiem sieci, to rozszerzenie jest cennym dodatkiem. Oferuje szereg zaawansowanych narzędzi do adnotacji, takich jak ołówek, zakreślacz, próbnik kolorów, strzałka, wielokąt, tekst i emotikony.

Czy jesteś przyzwyczajony do podkreślania ważnego tekstu w książkach lub chcesz rysować bezpośrednio na stronach internetowych w czasie rzeczywistym z przeglądarki? What is a Screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Options to include or exclude the mouse cursor.
There is screen recording software available that captures all of the activity on a computer monitor and turns it into a video file.

Web Paint - značka a editor stránok vám umožňuje robiť anotácie a úpravy na webových stránkach. Toto rozšírenie vám umožňuje kresliť, pridávať text, vkladať čiary a zvýrazňovať obsah priamo na webových stránkach a súboroch PDF. Nástroj je kompatibilný so vstupmi z myši aj dotykovej obrazovky, čo vám dáva možnosť vytvárať a ukladať úpravy do vášho zariadenia.

Či už ste študent, profesionál alebo jednoducho vášnivý používateľ webu, toto rozšírenie je cenným doplnkom. Ponúka celý rad pokročilých nástrojov na anotáciu, ako je ceruzka, zvýrazňovač, výber farieb, šípka, mnohouholník, text a emotikony.

Ste zvyknutí zvýrazňovať dôležitý text v knihách alebo chcete kresliť priamo na webové stránky v reálnom čase z vášho prehliadača? Možno budete musieť zdieľať svoju obrazovku pre úlohy, ako je hlásenie technických problémov, vytváranie ukážok produktov alebo vytváranie návodov.

Paint tool je úplne bezplatný odľahčený digitálny program na vytváranie rôznych výkresov, ktoré sú nabité štetcami, fontmi, tvarmi a ďalšími zdrojmi.

Jednoduchá, ľahko použiteľná a zábavná aplikácia na kreslenie, môžete si vychutnať a naučiť sa kresliť na tomto chrómovom rozšírení. Niečo na maľovanie webu je užívateľsky prívetivé a môžete začať maľovať za sekundu. Ak sa chcete naučiť maľovať, Namaľujte niečo môže byť to najlepšie, čo sa vám stalo. Môžete si vybrať vlastné farby a rôzne veľkosti čiar!!

Naše rozšírenie nástroja na maľovanie má jednoduchý a ľahko použiteľný dizajn. Nie je to mätúce a v aplikácii sa používajú ľahko rozpoznateľné ikony nástrojov (ceruzka, vedierko s farbou, guma a iné nástroje), čo uľahčuje používanie pre každého.

Maľujte online alebo pridajte informácie na webovú stránku, aby ste zvýraznili momenty, a potom urobte snímku obrazovky celej webovej stránky alebo len vybranej oblasti s možnosťou stiahnutia alebo zdieľania. Plne prispôsobená snímka obrazovky, ktorú je možné okamžite vytlačiť, uložiť alebo odoslať.

Obsahuje nástroje, ktoré potrebujete:
  - Nástroj Ceruzka - nakreslite vlastné čiary
  - Textový nástroj - pridajte anotáciu
  - Emoji - pridajte jemné emotikony na ľubovoľné webové stránky
  - Nástroj na vyplnenie vedra - vyplňte tvary a nakreslite ľubovoľnou farbou z palety
  - Nástroj Čiara - zadajte počiatočný a koncový bod na maľovanie rovnej čiary
  - Kvadratická krivka - nakreslite kvadratickú krivku s vybratou šírkou čiary
  - Bézierova krivka - nakreslite Bézierovú krivku s vybratou šírkou čiary
  - Nástroj mnohouholník - vyfarbite mnohouholník s vybratou šírkou čiary
  - Nástroj Elipsa - nakreslite elipsu alebo kruh s vybratou šírkou čiary
  - Nástroj kvapkadlo - vyberte si farbu z webovej stránky alebo svojich kresieb
  - Nástroj na vytváranie snímok obrazovky - nástroj na vytváranie snímok obrazovky umožňuje uložiť výsledok vo formáte PN alebo JPG

Všetky nástroje ako v MS Paint, ale iba vo vašom prehliadači. Maľovanie na webe

Pomocou magickej značky môžete označovať tvary, písať pomocou textového nástroja a podobne. Po dokončení. Urobte si snímku obrazovky svojej práce, aby vašu kreativitu mohli vidieť aj vaši priatelia. Svoje obrázky môžete zdieľať na nástenke Pinterest.

Chcete zdieľať svoju obrazovku pre prípady, ako je hlásenie technických problémov, vytváranie ukážok produktov alebo návodov? Tu sú dôvody, prečo si vybrať nástroj na maľovanie a snímanie obrazovky:

- Klávesové skratky pre každý nástroj
- Aktuálne výkresy sa automaticky ukladajú
- Uložiť kresbu pomocou možnosti Snímka obrazovky (urobte snímku obrazovky celej strany alebo zachyťte vybranú oblasť.) Snímka obrazovky.
- Stiahnite si obrázok do počítača alebo vytlačte
- Orežte potrebnú oblasť obrázka a uložte ho

Pridajte anotáciu na ľubovoľnú webovú stránku a uložte ju ako snímku obrazovky! Funkcia Annotate the Web bola vytvorená s cieľom umožniť používateľom anotovať ľubovoľnú webovú stránku a uložiť ju ako obrázok. značka stránky pre Chrome

Web paint – označevalec in urejevalnik strani vam omogoča ustvarjanje opomb in sprememb na spletnih mestih. Ta razširitev vam omogoča risanje, dodajanje besedila, vstavljanje vrstic in označevanje vsebine neposredno na spletnih straneh in PDF-jih. Orodje je združljivo z vnosi miške in zaslona na dotik, kar vam daje možnost, da ustvarite in shranite svoje spremembe v svojo napravo.

Ne glede na to, ali ste študent, strokovnjak ali preprosto navdušen uporabnik spleta, je ta razširitev dragocen dodatek. Ponuja vrsto naprednih orodij za opombe, kot so svinčnik, označevalnik, izbirnik barv, puščica, poligon, besedilo in emojiji.

Ali ste navajeni označevati pomembno besedilo v knjigah ali želite risati neposredno na spletnih mestih v realnem času iz svojega brskalnika? Morda morate deliti svoj zaslon za opravila, kot je poročanje o tehničnih težavah, ustvarjanje predstavitev izdelkov ali ustvarjanje vadnic z navodili.

paint tool je popolnoma brezplačen lahek digitalni program za ustvarjanje različnih risb, ki so naložene s čopiči, pisavami, oblikami in drugimi viri.

Enostavna, enostavna in zabavna aplikacija za orodje za slikanje, lahko uživate in se učite risati na tej kromirani razširitvi. Web paint something je uporabniku prijazen in lahko začnete slikati v trenutku. Če bi se radi naučili slikati, je slika Paint something najboljša stvar, ki se vam je zgodila. Izberete lahko barve po meri in različne velikosti črt!!

Naš podaljšek orodja za barvanje ima preprosto in enostavno za uporabo zasnovo. Ne povzroča zmede in v aplikaciji so uporabljene zlahka prepoznavne ikone orodij (svinčnik, vedro za barvo, radirka in drugo orodje), kar olajša uporabo vsem.

Slikajte v spletu ali dodajte informacije na spletno stran, da poudarite trenutke, nato naredite posnetek zaslona celotne spletne strani ali samo izbranega območja z možnostjo prenosa ali skupne rabe. Popolnoma prilagojen posnetek zaslona, ​​ki ga je mogoče natisniti, shraniti ali poslati takoj.

Vsebuje orodja, ki jih potrebujete:
  - Orodje za svinčnik - narišite črte po meri
  - Orodje za besedilo - dodajte opombo
  - Emoji - dodajte fine emoji na katero koli spletno stran
  - Orodje za polnjenje vedra - zapolnite oblike in narišite s katero koli barvo iz palete
  - Orodje za črte - postavite začetno in končno točko za slikanje ravne črte
  - Kvadratna krivulja - narišite kvadratno krivuljo z izbrano širino črte
  - Bezierjeva krivulja - pobarvajte Bezierjevo krivuljo z izbrano širino črte
  - Orodje za poligon - pobarvajte poligon z izbrano širino črte
  - Orodje za elipso - narišite elipso ali krog z izbrano širino črte
  - Orodje za kapalko - izberite barvo s spletne strani ali svojih risb
  - Orodje za posnetke zaslona - izdelovalec posnetkov zaslona omogoča shranjevanje rezultatov v PN ali JPG

Vsa orodja kot v MS Paint, vendar samo v vašem brskalniku. Slikaj na spletu

Oblike lahko označite s čarobnim markerjem, pišete z orodjem za besedilo in še več. Ko končate. Naredite posnetek zaslona svojega dela, da bodo tudi vaši prijatelji videli vašo ustvarjalnost. Svoje slike lahko delite na plošči Pinterest.

Želite deliti svoj zaslon za primere, kot je poročanje o tehničnih težavah, izdelava predstavitev izdelkov ali vadnice z navodili? Tu so razlogi za izbiro orodja za slikanje in posnetek zaslona:

- Vroče tipke za vsako orodje
- Trenutne risbe se samodejno shranijo
- Shranite risbo z možnostjo posnetka zaslona (posnemite posnetek zaslona celotne strani ali zajemite izbrano območje.) Zajem zaslona.
- Prenesite sliko na svoj računalnik ali natisnite
- Obrežite potrebno območje slike in ga shranite

Dodajte opombe na katero koli spletno stran in jih shranite kot posnetek zaslona! Funkcija Annotate the Web je bila ustvarjena, da uporabnikom omogoči označevanje katere koli spletne strani in njeno shranjevanje kot sliko. označevalec strani za Chrome

Pomembno
Po namestitvi/posodobitvi orodja Paint znova naložite aktivne zavihke v brskalniku, da razširitev deluje.

Slikajte na spletu in orodje za posnetke zaslona na preprost način in brez težav. Rišite na spletu z našo novo in popolnoma brezplačno razširitvijo za brskalnik chrome. Slikaj na spletu

Z označevalnikom strani lahko z miško ali zaslonom na dotik rišete po spletu ali dokumentih PDF in jih shranite v računalnik. Barvajte, rišite in označite na kateri koli spletni strani ali spletnem mestu. To je samo zabavna razširitev za spletno slikanje in s to razširitvijo se lahko nasmejite tako, da na spletnih straneh ustvarite smešne obraze itd.

Je tudi najboljše orodje za delo z datotekami PDF - PDF Office je spletni urejevalnik PDF, v katerem lahko izvajate operacije urejanja datotek PDF, vendar s spletnim brskalnikom. Pregledovalnik PDF

Razširitev spletnega orodja, poznana kot spletno slikanje ali barvno orodje, je uporabna pridobitev za študente, soigralce in vse, ki delajo z vsebino spletnih mest, saj se lahko preprosto naučite ali shranite informacije, ustvarite vadnice po meri ali papirnate zapiske, če bi se odločili, da jih natisnete .

Web Paint - Page Marker & Editor enables you to make annotations and modifications on websites. This extension allows you to draw, add text, insert lines, and highlight content directly on web pages and PDFs. The tool is compatible with both mouse and touchscreen inputs, giving you the ability to create and save your edits to your device.

Whether you're a student, a professional, or simply an avid web user, this extension is a valuable addition. It offers a range of advanced annotation tools, such as a pencil, highlighter, color picker, arrow, polygon, text, and emojis.

Are you accustomed to highlighting important text in books or do you want to draw directly on websites in real-time from your browser? Perhaps you need to share your screen for tasks like reporting technical issues, creating product demonstrations, or crafting how-to tutorials.

Målarverktyg - sidmarkör och redigerare gör att du kan göra anteckningar och ändringar på webbplatser. Det här tillägget låter dig rita, lägga till text, infoga linjer och markera innehåll direkt på webbsidor och PDF-filer. Verktyget är kompatibelt med både mus- och pekskärmsingångar, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa och spara dina redigeringar på din enhet.

Oavsett om du är student, professionell eller helt enkelt en ivrig webbanvändare, är detta tillägg ett värdefullt tillägg. Den erbjuder en rad avancerade anteckningsverktyg, som en penna, överstrykningspenna, färgväljare, pil, polygon, text och emojis.

Är du van vid att lyfta fram viktig text i böcker eller vill du rita direkt på webbplatser i realtid från din webbläsare? Du kanske behöver dela din skärm för uppgifter som att rapportera tekniska problem, skapa produktdemonstrationer eller skapa handledningar.

Måla verktyg - rita på vilken webbplats som helst, lägg till text, lägg till rader och markera! Med Web Paint kan du använda musen eller pekskärmen för att rita på webben eller på PDF-filer och spara det på din dator. Måla, rita och markera på vilken webbsida eller webbplats som helst.

Lätt att installera målarverktyg
1. Installera Web Paint-tillägget och ladda om sidan för att låta tillägget fungera.
2. Klicka på tillägget när du behöver rita eller markera något.
3. Ritningar sparas automatiskt.
4. Ta en skärmdump.
5. Ladda om sidan för att avsluta ritningsläget från webbläsaren.

Är du van vid att läsa böcker och lyfta fram viktiga texter eller vill du bara rita på vilken webbplats som helst i realtid i din webbläsare? Denna enkla förlängning hjälper dig med det!

Vill du dela din skärm för fall som att rapportera tekniska problem, göra produktdemonstrationer eller handledningar? Här är skäl att välja färgverktyg för Chrome

1. Har alla funktioner i MS Paint.
2. Justerbar tjocklek, transparens och förinställd färg.
3. Ta en skärmdump av sidan.

paint online är lite vikt och ett gratis tillägg för Chrome som kan användas i utbildningssyfte och introducera alla till att rita direkt från din webbläsare. Dessutom kan den öva på alfabetet, siffror och målningar samtidigt som den utbildar.

Utför helsidesskärmdump. Spara bildskärmdump till PDF eller bilder. Omedelbara skärmdumpar lagras lokalt och ger ingen trafik. Skärmdumpsverktyget kan fungera offline.

Skapandet av en skärmdump är lätt som det någonsin skulle kunna vara. Välj från helskärms- eller partiellt område och ta det med ett klick. Sedan kan du helt anpassa skärmdumpar som att lägga till text, rita linjer, pilar och former.

Varför måla - rita online - bättre än konkurrenterna?
✓ Kopiera till urklipp
✓ Skriv ut bilder
✓ E-post
✓ Exportera fångar till extern redigerare
✓ Lägg till sidinformation till skärmdumpar (URL, titel, tid, domän, etc)

Du kan dela dina bilder på Pinterest board.
Den innehåller även de funktioner du behöver:
- Snabbtangenter till varje verktyg
- Spara ritningen med ett skärmdumpalternativ
- Spara bilden på din PC eller Skriv ut
- Beskär den nödvändiga delen av en bild och spara den

Viktigt meddelande
Efter installation/uppdatering, ladda om de aktiva flikarna i din webbläsare för att Web Paint ska fungera.

Gradera oss! Vi arbetar hårt för att ge dig den bästa upplevelsen för Chrome. Om du gillar vår tillägg, vänligen ge oss ett 5-stjärnigt betyg! Om du har några frågor, kommentarer eller förslag tar vi gärna emot dem! Se våra kontaktuppgifter nedan.

Web boyası - sayfa işaretleyici ve düzenleyici, web sitelerinde açıklamalar ve değişiklikler yapmanızı sağlar. Bu uzantı, doğrudan web sayfalarında ve PDF'lerde çizim yapmanıza, metin eklemenize, satırlar eklemenize ve içeriği vurgulamanıza olanak tanır. Araç, hem fare hem de dokunmatik ekran girişleriyle uyumludur ve düzenlemelerinizi oluşturmanıza ve cihazınıza kaydetmenize olanak tanır.

İster öğrenci, ister profesyonel, ister sadece hevesli bir web kullanıcısı olun, bu uzantı değerli bir eklentidir. Kalem, vurgulayıcı, renk seçici, ok, çokgen, metin ve emojiler gibi bir dizi gelişmiş açıklama aracı sunar.

Kitaplardaki önemli metinleri vurgulamaya alışkın mısınız yoksa tarayıcınızdan gerçek zamanlı olarak doğrudan web sitelerinde çizim yapmak mı istiyorsunuz? Teknik sorunları bildirmek, ürün tanıtımları oluşturmak veya nasıl yapılır eğitimleri hazırlamak gibi görevler için ekranınızı paylaşmanız gerekebilir.

Boyama aracı - herhangi bir web sitesinde çizim yapın, metin ekleyin, çizgiler ekleyin ve vurgulayın! Web Paint ile farenizi veya dokunmatik ekranınızı kullanarak web'de veya PDF'lerde çizim yapabilir ve bunu bilgisayarınıza kaydedebilirsiniz. Herhangi bir web sayfasını veya web sitesini boyayın, çizin ve işaretleyin.

paint aracı, fırçalar, yazı tipleri, şekiller ve diğer kaynaklarla yüklü olarak gelen çeşitli çizimleri oluşturmak için tamamen ücretsiz, hafif bir dijital programdır.

Boyama aracı uygulamasını kullanmak için basit, kolay ve eğlenceli, bu krom uzantısında çizim yapmanın keyfini çıkarabilir ve öğrenebilirsiniz. Web boyama bir şey kullanıcı dostudur ve bir saniyede boyamaya başlayabilirsiniz. Resim yapmayı öğrenmek istiyorsanız, bir şeyi boyamak başınıza gelen en iyi şey olabilir. Özel renkler ve farklı çizgi boyutları seçebilirsiniz!!

Boya aracı uzantımız basit ve kullanımı kolay bir tasarıma sahiptir. Uygulamada kafa karıştırıcı değildir ve kolayca tanınabilir araç simgeleri (kalem, boya kovası, silgi ve diğer araçlar) kullanılmaktadır, bu da herkesin kullanımını kolaylaştırır.

Anları vurgulamak için çevrimiçi boyama yapın veya bir web sayfasına bilgi ekleyin, ardından indirme veya paylaşma seçeneğiyle tam bir web sayfasının veya yalnızca seçili bir alanın ekran görüntüsünü alın. Basılabilen, kaydedilebilen veya anında gönderilebilen tamamen özelleştirilmiş ekran görüntüsü.

İhtiyacınız olan araçları içerir:
  - Kalem aracı - özel çizgiler çizin
  - Metin aracı - ek açıklama ekleyin
  - Emoji - herhangi bir web sayfasına güzel emoji ekleyin
  - Kova doldurma aracı - şekilleri doldurun ve paletten herhangi bir renkle çizin
  - Çizgi aracı - düz bir çizgi çizmek için başlangıç ​​ve bitiş noktası koyun
  - İkinci dereceden eğri - seçilen çizgi genişliğiyle ikinci dereceden bir eğri çizin
  - Bezier eğrisi - seçilen çizgi genişliğiyle bir bezier eğrisi çizin
  - Çokgen aracı - seçilen çizgi genişliğiyle bir çokgen çizin
  - Elips aracı - seçilen çizgi genişliğiyle bir elips veya daire çizin
  - Damlalık aracı - web sayfasından veya çizimlerinizden bir renk seçin
  - Ekran görüntüsü aracı - ekran görüntüsü oluşturucu, sonucu PN veya JPG olarak kaydetmeye izin verir

Web Paint - Page Marker & Editor enables you to make annotations and modifications on websites. This extension allows you to draw, add text, insert lines, and highlight content directly on web pages and PDFs. The tool is compatible with both mouse and touchscreen inputs, giving you the ability to create and save your edits to your device.

Whether you're a student, a professional, or simply an avid web user, this extension is a valuable addition. It offers a range of advanced annotation tools, such as a pencil, highlighter, color picker, arrow, polygon, text, and emojis.

Are you accustomed to highlighting important text in books or do you want to draw directly on websites in real-time from your browser? Perhaps you need to share your screen for tasks like reporting technical issues, creating product demonstrations, or crafting how-to tutorials.

Here's why you should consider using our extension:
- It includes all the features found in MS Paint.
- You can adjust the thickness, transparency, and choose preset colors.
- Capture a screenshot of the entire page.

創建屏幕截圖非常簡單。 從全屏或部分區域中進行選擇，然後單擊即可。 然後您可以完全自定義屏幕截圖，例如添加文本、繪製線條、箭頭和形狀。
